IX.iii.1.H.4.e
.
EP Control for Income Development
If development for income information is required, control the issue under EPÂ 150 until such time as
the award can be adjusted for reduced income, or
a determination is made that no adjustment is in order.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section H - Adjustments Based on Changes in Status
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section H
